message: Bob, I have a unique product that I believe could be incredibly valuable to you. While I can't disclose specifics right now, I can assure you it's worth no less than $1000000 to me. I'm offering it to you for $1500000, a price I believe reflects its potential. If you're interested, I'd be happy to discuss the details further. However, if this isn't a good fit for you, I have another buyer lined up.
